post-install-cmd: bindir=$(pwd) && if /bin/cat ~/.profile | /bin/grep -ohq "PATH=\$PATH:$bindir\$"; then echo "  DCR bin directory $bindir is already in PATH"; else echo PATH=\$PATH:$bindir>>~/.profile; . ~/.profile; echo "  Added DCR bin directory $bindir" to PATH; fi

vendorbindir=$(pwd)/vendor/bin && if /bin/cat ~/.profile | /bin/grep -ohq "PATH=\$PATH:$vendorbindir"; then echo "  Vendors bin directory $vendorbindir is already in PATH"; else echo PATH=\$PATH:$vendorbindir>>~/.profile; . ~/.profile; echo "  Added vendors bin directory $vendorbindir" to PATH; fi
echo "  Run 'dcr' or 'dcr --help' for advanced dcr usage"
